00030 void LineSearchAlg::lineSearchInit( int lineSearchSteps,  
00031                                     double tolerance, 
00032                                     double backOff,
00033                                     double exponentBase,
00034                                     double downhilllThresh,
00035                                     int maxTries) {
00036     
00037     // Additional parameters needed to control the line search.
00038     this->lineSearchSteps = lineSearchSteps;
00039     this->tolerance = tolerance;
00040     this->backOff = backOff;
00041     this->exponentBase = exponentBase;
00042     this->downhilllThresh = downhilllThresh;
00043     this->maxTries = maxTries;
00044     
00045     stepSizeBackup = stepSize;
00046     
00047     origParams.resize(controller->getNumParams());
00048     params.resize(controller->getNumParams());
00049     grads.resize(controller->getNumParams());
00050     testGrads.resize(controller->getNumParams());
00051     
00052     seed=0;
00053 }

00060 double LineSearchAlg::lineSearch(int& totalSteps, double lastEpochVal, Vector& totalRewards) {
00061 
00062     double currentStep = stepSize;
00063     double bestStep = 0.0;
00064     double currentReward = lastEpochVal;
00065     double bestReward = lastEpochVal;
00066     double lastIP = 0; // Last inner product
00067     double factor = exponentBase;
00068     int its = 1;
00069     bool backward = false;
00070 
00071     // To begin, lets get a copy of the current parameters. This is expensive. Don't do it too often.
00072     origParams.clear();
00073     controller->reduce(origParams, Approximator::PARAMS);
00074     grads.clear();
00075     controller->reduce(grads, Approximator::GRADS);
00076 
00077 
00078     // Immediate exit if grad is too small.
00079     if (norm_2(grads) < tolerance) {
00080         maxSteps = 1;
00081         cout<<"\tLS: R="<<bestReward<<" : Terminating because gradient<tolerance\n";
00082         return bestReward;
00083     }
00084     
00085     lastIP = incrementLineSearch(currentStep, totalRewards, totalSteps, currentReward);
00086         
00087     if (lastIP < -tolerance) {
00088         // We have gone backwards. Reset step size and program to
00089         // exponentially reduce step size.
00090         cout<<"\tLS: its=0 R="<<currentReward<<" stepSize="<<currentStep<<" IP="<<lastIP<<" : heading backward\n";
00091         backward = true;
00092         currentStep = stepSize/factor;
00093         lastIP = incrementLineSearch(currentStep, totalRewards, totalSteps, currentReward);
00094     }
00095     
00096     
00097     if (fabs(lastIP) < tolerance) {
00098         // We've either magically found the local optimum, or more
00099         // likely we've done something stupid and gone to an
00100         // extremum. Try resetting the step size to it's inital
00101         // value. Assumes this is a small value.
00102         cout<<"\tLS: its=0 R="
00103             <<currentReward
00104             <<" stepSize="
00105             <<currentStep
00106             <<" IP="
00107             <<lastIP
00108             <<" : reset after immediate extremum\n";
00109         stepSize = stepSizeBackup;
00110         currentStep = stepSize;
00111         lastIP = incrementLineSearch(currentStep, totalRewards, totalSteps, currentReward);
00112     }
00113 
00114     cout<<"\tLS: its=1 R="<<currentReward<<" stepSize="<<currentStep<<" IP="<<lastIP;
00115 
00116     while (its < maxTries && 
00117            ((!backward && lastIP > tolerance) || (backward && lastIP < -tolerance))) {
00118         if (currentReward > bestReward) {
00119             bestReward = currentReward;
00120             bestStep = currentStep;
00121             cout<<" *";
00122         }
00123         cout<<endl;
00124         currentStep *= (backward?1.0/factor:factor);
00125         lastIP = incrementLineSearch(currentStep, totalRewards, totalSteps, currentReward);
00126         cout<<"\tLS: its="<<++its<<" R="<<currentReward<<" stepSize="<<currentStep<<" IP="<<lastIP;       
00127     }
00128     cout<<endl;
00129 
00130     if  ((backward && lastIP > tolerance) || (!backward && lastIP < -tolerance)) {
00131       // We stopped because ip changed sign, within tolerance. 
00132       // Backoff step to before ip changed sign. 
00133       // Send out nre parameters.
00134       currentStep /= (backward?1.0/factor:factor);
00135       if (currentStep == bestStep) currentReward =  bestReward;
00136       params.assign(origParams + currentStep*grads);
00137       controller->scatter(params, Approximator::PARAMS);  
00138     }
00139 
00140     // Finished line search. Do sanity check on final reward value.
00141     if (bestReward > currentReward*(downhilllThresh+1)) {
00142         // Not allowed to make no progress. But be conservative if all else fails.
00143         if (bestStep == 0) bestStep = stepSizeBackup; 
00144         params.assign(origParams + bestStep*grads);
00145         controller->scatter(params, Approximator::PARAMS);   
00146         currentReward = bestReward;
00147         currentStep = bestStep;
00148     }
00149     
00150     stepSize = currentStep/backOff;
00151 
00152     cout<<"\tLS: its="<<its++<<" R="<<currentReward<<" stepSize="<<currentStep<<" IP="<<lastIP<<" : Final"<<endl;
00153     return bestReward;
00154 
00155 
00156 }

00159 
00160 double LineSearchAlg::incrementLineSearch(double currentStep, Vector& totalRewards, int& totalSteps, double& currentReward) {
00161 
00162     // Try the current stepSize   
00163     params.assign(origParams + currentStep*grads);
00164     controller->scatter(params, Approximator::PARAMS);   
00165     controller->resetTrace(); // Normally the batch estimates continue with previous trace.
00166     srandom(seed);
00167     currentReward = doSteps(totalRewards, lineSearchSteps, true);
00168     controller->computeDirection(lineSearchSteps);
00169     totalSteps += lineSearchSteps;
00170     testGrads.clear();
00171     controller->reduce(testGrads, Approximator::GRADS);
00172     // If inner prod between test grad and start grad is negative, we
00173     // are going downhill
00174     return inner_prod(testGrads, grads);
00175     
00176 }
00177  
00178 
00179 double LineSearchAlg::learnCore(int stepsPerEpoch, int& totalSteps) {
00180 
00181     double lastEpochVal;
00182     Vector totalRewards(simulator->getRewardDim());
00183 
00184     // Reset random number generator to help line search
00185     srandom(seed);
00186     
00187     // Estimate grad
00188     lastEpochVal = doSteps(totalRewards, stepsPerEpoch, true);
00189     totalSteps += stepsPerEpoch;
00190     
00191     // Estimate search direction
00192     controller->computeDirection(stepsPerEpoch);
00193     
00194     printPerformanceInfo(false, totalSteps,  lastEpochVal,  controller->getMaxParam(), 0);
00195     lastEpochVal = lineSearch(totalSteps, lastEpochVal, totalRewards);
00196 
00197     if (useAutoBaseline) baseline.assign(totalRewards);
00198 
00199     return lastEpochVal;
00200 
00201 }
